subject: Re: [junit] Testing GUI Classes with no X-Display
msgSnippet: We deal with this by having X Windows running on our Linux build machine and having ant set the DISPLAY environment variable to point to the running server.
messageBody:
We deal with this by having X Windows running on our Linux build
machine and having ant set the DISPLAY environment variable to point to
the running server.

We're converting to an automatic test detection system that marks test
types and we plan to mark tests that require GUI code to run and only
run them in environments that have the GUI.

Regards,

Rob
